definition.name: transfer_system
definition.definition: An incomplete transfer system O on a finite group G is a wide subcategory of the Burnside category of G satisfying: (1) restriction stability, (2) composition closure, and (3) a base-change axiom. It encodes which transfer (norm) maps are available. Transfer systems biject with equivalence classes of N_infinity operads (Blumberg-Hill 2015).
